key_risks: High debt levels and financial challenges
Competitive pressures from larger telecommunications companies
Dependence on government funding and regulatory risks
Customer retention issues due to service outages and customer service problems
Uncertainties from the transition to a privately held company
controversies: Significant increase in short interest reflecting investor skepticism
Criticism for customer service issues and service outages
social_issues: Customer service issues affecting customer satisfaction and retention
governance_issues: Leadership changes and uncertainties regarding future strategic direction post-acquisition
